channel.title: Docs on GraSPH Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on GraSPH Docs

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started # This page will help you get setup and started to run the GraSPH code. And is aimed at beginners. The instruction assume you are working on an Ubuntu machine. a Virtual Machine (VM) or WSL2 will work fine too. This page assumes you are working in a terminal. Steps are seperated based on which version you wish to run. See the table of contents on the right side of the page.
